author: Joel

review: I have used the unit for a few months now and find it does what it says. The voice search is neat but not a must have. It is very fast and the performance is excellent. The only problem I have had is occasionally when a show I'm watching comes back from commercial break (like when using Hulu) the screen is black but the sound still works. Backing out of the show and resuming the show usually resets the video. This is rare but does happen for me. Not sure if Amazon Fire TV is the problem or Hulu. I do find myself using the Fire TV more often than my satellite these days.
